comments:
I attempted to feed the attached file to the image analyzer example and got an error dialog that 
said "Error loading file ... i/o error (java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0): 
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0".

Suspect this is a problem with the PNG reader.

Created an attachment (id=6175)
File that could not be displayed by ImageAnalyzer

Confirmed it is a bug in our png decoder. The part of the code doing boundary 
checking is wrong. Need to investigate root of the problem.
